name: Raccoon Mayhem
description:
A physics-based arcade game which was produced within 46 hours for the 2022 Kiwijam. Roll a racoon around, picking up the trash that humanity has left behind. Once the player has grown large enough, they can take out the real trash. Once all trash has been picked up, before the timer runs out,  the game will end.

Theme Together

A literal interpretation of the player sticking rubbish together, to clean the city.

Mechanics

Once the trash ball has reached size milestones, larger trash can be picked up. The player can obtain more time by picking up trash. The larger you are, the less time you will be given.

Tiers:
  • Small: Rubbish
  • Medium: Cones, Skateboards, and trash cans
  • Large: People, Benches and Signs
  • Very Large: Trees, Fences and Cars
Team
  • Michael Jordan      - Programmer
  • Roger Painting        - Main prop modeller
  • Fiona Cheung          - UI/Menues
  • Sabrina Li                   - Some Textures
  • William Lawrence - Some models
